scripts.dev: npm run dev:worker & npm run dev:web
scripts.dev:old: npm run build -w apps/web && npm run dev:worker
scripts.build: npm run build -w apps/web && npm run build -w apps/api && npm run build -w apps/worker
scripts.build:local: npm run build:desktop -w services/local-runtime-suite && npm run build:site -w services/local-runtime-suite
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build -w apps/web && npm run deploy:ci -w apps/worker
scripts.deploy:local-suite: npm run build -w services/local-runtime-suite/site && npx wrangler deploy --config services/local-runtime-suite/worker/wrangler.jsonc
